tasks.task: Participate in the Menorca land stewardship program (Custodia Agraria)
subtasks: Commit to adopting sustainable agricultural practices
Allow Gov Menorca to provide services and materials for farm improvements
Submit to soil analysis and follow management recommendations
Implement new directed grazing practices
Restore rainwater harvesting systems (e.g., traditional canal systems, algeops)
Utilize solar power pumps for water systems
Apply key line landscaping and install water canal covers
Participate in annual bio indicator monitoring (citizen science project)
Create water sources for wildlife
Install nesting boxes for natural pest control
Undergo natural value inventory for habitat identification
Engage in monthly volunteering sessions for habitat maintenance and restoration
Protect livestock habitat, especially forested areas and wild pastures
Remove farm waste
Install traditional wild olive tree gates
Repair dry stone walls protecting fruit trees
(Not explicitly stated, but inferred) Maintain and restore dry stone wall structures
Assist in product promotion and marketing
Participate in training and consulting sessions
Engage in environmental education and volunteering
